rev.comment: /* See also */ not really needed because this article is already linked to in the navbox template in the footer - otherwise, what's the point of that box?
/* Career in Edinburgh and Glasgow */ copyedit
/* Works */ Added bit on Essays on Philosophical Subjects
/* Works */ Added Wealth of Nations info
/* The Theory of Moral Sentiments */ Added bit
/* The Wealth of Nations */ readding main link
/* The Theory of Moral Sentiments */ adding some text
/* Wealth of Nations */ relinking Wealth of Nations. I agree that it was overlinked, but no need for main template unless you really can't use an inline link
/* Early life */ c/e, adding a reference
/* References */ add a period to the end of each reference
adding fact tag to "father of economics"
/* References */ sorting by last name, first name, then title
using pp for refs with page ranges
/* Biography */ use full name in the beginning of body as well as in leade
/* Works */ many -> several for less pov
/* Works */ notable makes it sound like it's a good thing to be criticized, imo
/* Wealth of Nations */ image caption to full sentence
/* Later years */ image caption to full sentence
/* Tour of France */ image caption to full sentence
/* Education */ making a full sentence out of image caption; can more context be added here?
/* Biography */ add descriptor because he talks about later childhoo events
/* Influence */ past tense, because this specific note must have been issued already to exist!
/* Influence */ copyediting image caption; making into a full sentence
/* Influence */ Added £20 note featuring Adam Smith
/* Wealth of Nations */ No wikilinks in blockquote
does not need to be any smaller
Looking again, this is not really a full quote, removed blockquote tags
/* Biography */ revise citation again to be correct
/* Biography */ revise citation to be appropriate
/* Wealth of Nations */ No quotes in blockquote
/* Biography */ revise citation and block quote
/* Biography */ revise gypsy story and add actual reference
/* External links */ purging external links, removing those that are already references, etc.
/* Influence */ removing unreliable and unnecessary reference
removing underconstruction; I'm not getting any more edit conflicts :)
/* Critics of Adam Smith */ try not to reiterate the article's title
/* External links */ removing wikisourcer; already linked to in refs
/* Critics of Adam Smith */ cleanup; linking, sorting
Removing unimportant detail that looks out-of-place.
/* Critics of Adam Smith */ fmt refs
/* Interpreting Adam Smith */ Added comment, copyedit
/* Personal character and views */ fixing reference
/* Critics of Adam Smith */ reformatted refs using name tags
/* Major works */ Wasn't this written by [[Hugh Blair]]?
/* Critics of Adam Smith */ removed "Ibid"s per [[Wikipedia:Footnotes#Style recommendations]]
/* The "Adam Smith-Problem" */ Removed liberalism template, copyedit
/* Interpreting Adam Smith */ copyedit, refs, added bit
Tagging or repairing external links using [[User:Dispenser/Link checker|checklinks tool]]
/* Interpreting Adam Smith */ no space between refs
Date the maintenance tags and general fixes

Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/207.170.247.26|207.170.247.26]] ([[User talk:207.170.247.26|talk]]) to last version by Doopdoop

Reverted 1 edit by [[Special:Contributions/216.134.28.86|216.134.28.86]] identified as [[WP:VAND|vandalism]] to last revision by [[User:PyroGamer|PyroGamer]]. using [[WP:TWINKLE|TW]]
/* Wealth of Nations */ Smith never used the term Lassaiz Faire; though he was well aware of it, he frequently critisized its proponents. Adam Smith's economics is NOT lassaiz-faire
Removed statement that Paris Hilton is Adam Smith's relative (there is no source for this dubious claim).
/* Wealth of Nations */ Removed pointless and inappropriate POV challenges. Statements of Smith's EXPRESSED views are not "POV".
/* Wealth of Nations */ Ridiculous to assert that Smith did NOT emphasize division of labor. Not every claim made by an editor is a TENABLE claim.
